titles.title: A bill to amend the Asian Development Bank Act to authorize consent to, and authorize appropriations for, the United States contribution to the fifth replenishment of the resources of the Asian Development fund, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5407-5408)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 5/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Asian Development Bank Act to authorize the U.S. Governor of the Asian Development Bank to contribute a specified amount to the Asian Development Fund, subject to obtaining appropriations. Authorizes appropriations.
